quotes.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Experience is one thing you can't get for nothing.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Art has to move you and design does not, unless it's a good design for a bus.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: The love of liberty is the love of others; the love of power is the love of ourselves.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Without poets, without artists, men would soon weary of nature's monotony.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire
